src:
Huawei Mulai Dapat Titik Terang Lagi Soal Aplikasi Google
07 Nov 2019, 06:30 by Mansur
Aplikasi Google Siap Terpasang Lagi di HP Huawei?
Oketekno – Sudah berlangsung cukup lama, dan bahkan Huawei Mate 30 series kemarin telah terkena dampak dari perang dagang antara China dan pihak Amerika Serikat. Dengan demikian, Huawei tidak dapat memasang aplikasi Google pada ponsel Premium terbarunya itu. Meski demikian, perusahaan tetap optimis dengan menyebarkan ponsel terbarunya itu.
Akan tetapi baru-baru ini terlihat sudah ada cahaya kecil harapan bagi sang vendor untuk kembali menjalin kerjasama dengan Google, sehingga berbagai macam layanan intim Android nanti bisa didapatkan kembali. Kalau masalah sistem operasi memang tidak jadi hambatan, karena OS itu sifatnya terbuka, akan tetapi kalau tanpa dilengkapi Google Play Service, bisa dikatakan Android hanya berfungsi 30% saja.

Simak Nih: 

Diblokir AS, Huawei Kesulitan Cari Pengganti Aplikasi Google


Tidak disebutkan dengan jelas kapan pihak Huawei akan mendapatkan akses ke layanan Google Play Service kembali. Namun diharapkan bisa segera dan dalam waktu dekat ini aplikasi Google dapat terpasang pada Smartphone Huawei kembali. Ini diperkuat dengan beberapa indikasi yang sudah menguat dalam beberapa waktu terakhir ini.


Copyright©IstimewaLink Post: https://twitter.com/somospostpc/status/1174686942820278272

Menteri Perdagangan AS bernama Wilber Ross telah mengatakan kalau Pembicaraan antara China dan AS tentang kesepakatan perdagangan yang sudah cukup lama jadi sengketa ini telah menunjukkan arah yang positif. Bukan cuman Huawei saja, melainkan banyak perusahaan besar lain dari China yang tidak dapat menjalin kerjasama dengan perusahaan asal Amerika Serikat.

Ketahui Yuk: 

Hindari Aplikasi Google Ini Jika Tidak Ingin Kuota Cepat Habis


Akan tetapi ketiadaan Aplikasi Google pada Huawei Mate 30 Series kemarin menjadi yang paling mencolok, dikarenakan HP Android sekarang ini telah menjadi fokus utama sebagian besar masyarakat Dunia. Bagi kalangan yang hendak membeli ponsel Premium itu akan berpikir ulang, dikarenakan tanpa Google Play Service, maka aplikasi seperti YouTube, Gmail, Maps, dan aplikasi Google lainnya tidak dapat berjalan lancar.
Kalau memang AS benar-benar sudah melunak dalam waktu dekat ini, besar kemungkinannya Huawei P40 yang akan rilis di Q1 2020 mendatang sudah dilengkapi dengan aplikasi Google lagi. Sehingga penjualan HP Android dari Huawei dapat mengalami peningkatan lagi secara signifikan kembali.
baca juga: Nasib Huawei Mate 30 Tanpa Aplikasi Google
text:
Huawei Starts to Get More Bright Points About Google Applications
Nov 7 2019, 06:30 by Mansur
Google Application Ready to Install Again on Huawei Cellphone?
Oketekno - It has been going on for quite a long time, and even the Huawei Mate 30 series yesterday was affected by the trade war between China and the United States. Thus, Huawei can not install Google applications on the latest premium mobile phone. However, the company remains optimistic by spreading the latest cellphones.
However, recently there has been seen a small light of hope for the vendor to re-establish cooperation with Google, so that a variety of intimate Android services can later be found again. If the operating system problem does not become an obstacle, because the OS is open, but if it is not equipped with Google Play Service, it can be said that Android only functions 30%.

Listen Here:

Blocked by US, Huawei Difficulties Search for Google Application Substitutes


It was not stated clearly when Huawei will get access to the Google Play Service again. But it is expected to be immediate and in the near future this Google application can be installed on the Huawei Smartphone again. This is reinforced by several indications that have strengthened in recent times.


Copyright © Special Link Post: https://twitter.com/somospostpc/status/1174686942820278272

US Commerce Secretary Wilber Ross has said that talks between China and the US about a trade agreement that has been around long enough so this dispute has shown a positive direction. Not only Huawei, but many other large companies from China that can not establish cooperation with companies from the United States.

Let's Know:

Avoid This Google Application If You Don't Want Quota to Run Out Fast


However, the absence of the Google Application on the Huawei Mate 30 Series yesterday became the most striking, because Android phones have now become the main focus of most people in the world. For those who want to buy a Premium cellphone, they will think again, because without the Google Play Service, applications such as YouTube, Gmail, Maps and other Google applications cannot run smoothly.
If the US really has softened in the near future, it is likely that the Huawei P40 which will be released in the upcoming Q1 2020 is already equipped with Google applications again. So that Android cellphone sales from Huawei can be significantly increased again.
Also read: The fate of Huawei Mate 30 without the Google Application
